metadata.description: This ruleset finds JOTM JTA implementations.

hint.title: JTA: JOTM usage
hint.message:
The modules required by JOTM's JTA implementation are not loaded by default on EAP6+. This likely results in a "java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sun/rmi/server/UnicastServerRef" exception when it is deployed.
To solve this issue it is highly recommended to use JTA provided JBoss EAP since JOTM is not maintained anymore.
If you want to stick with JOTM, you can add "sun/rmi/server" as system export in your applications deployment-structure.xml as described in [this knowledge base article](https://access.redhat.com/solutions/1217863).
